p: Considering a variety of oxidants and free radicals that are implicated in the pathogenesis of inflammatory process and considering that dietary components also may contribute to the antioxidant defense either by providing redox active compounds that can directly scavenge or neutralize free radicals, we investigated the oxidative stress through H 2DCFDA probes and ELISA kits. As supposed, after CAR-injection, we observed a very important increase of ROS production ( Figure 5A) and, on the other hand, a decrease in SOD ( Figure 5B), GSH ( Figure 5C), and CAT ( Figure 5D) activity compared to sham animals. After cashew nuts treatment, decrease in oxidative stress and increase in the activity of SOD, GSH, and CAT were observed.
